amendment.description: To promote job creation, family time, and small business preservation in the adjustment of the Federal minimum wage.

action.text: Amendment SA 128 proposed by Senator Santorum.

vote.text: Amendment SA 128 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 38 - 61. Record Vote Number: 27.

action.text: Previous action on Amendment SA 128 vitiated by Unanimous Consent.
Proposed amendment SA 128 withdrawn in Senate.
